page.title: 13A COLLIERY UNDERMANAGER.
page.content: Peter Warburton a colliery under manager responsible for safety, efficency and the co-ordination of work of engineers and deputies. At 5.45 he discusses site work with the engineer and reviews the previous weekend work with the acting manager. At 6.45 he prepares his daily report and checks points with the safety man. After a short break he meets NACODS representatives to discuss proposed work during the annual holiday. At 8.30 attends managers morning meeting to discuss safety and electrical installations on new site. 9.30 underground out at 12.45,break. 14.30 talks to site manager.Home 15.10 16.30 telephoned at home,returns to work checks new gearbox.Leaves for home at 19.20.
